title: Gracious 1248 Sq. Ft. apartment in Atlanta
posting_body: ['Modera Old Ivy', 'Property Address', '3651 Lenox Rd NE, ,', 'Atlanta, GA, 30305', '<URL>', 'Stretch out in your spacious new 2 bed 2.5 bath apartment at Modera Old Ivy.', 'This popular floor plan is now available for as low as $3,520.00 a month.', 'Give us a call or stop by to check out all of the amenities.', 'Floor Plan Details', 'Name: Tower - B07', '2 Bedrooms / 2.5 Bathrooms', '1248 Sq.', 'Ft.', '$3,520.00 - $3,625.00', 'Community Amenities', 'Dedicated Bike Storage', 'Complimentary Wi-Fi in Social Spaces', 'Controlled Guest Access Technology', 'Electric Vehicle Charging Stations', 'Controlled Access Parking Garage', 'Package Locker System', 'Smart Home Technology Throughout Community', 'Boutique Feel with Modern Design', 'National Green Building Standard Gold Certified', 'Rooftop Deck with Exceptional Views, Fire Pit, BBQ Grills & Lounge Seating', 'Demonstration Kitchen with Outdoor Grills & Dining Space', 'Hotel-Inspired Pool with Luxe Cabanas, Lounge Seating, Green Wall Accents & More', 'Wellness Center with Zen Garden, Dry Sauna, Steam Room and Fitness Center', 'Fitness Studio with Cardio & Weight Stations', 'Co-Work Space with Multiple Seating Areas', 'Game Room with HDTV, Ping-Pong & Shuffle Board', '4th Floor Terrace with BBQ Grills, Outdoor Games & Lounge Seating', 'Library with Conference Table & Terrace', '24-Hr Concierge Services', 'Pet-friendly apartment homes with pet spa', 'Dry Cleaning Lockers', 'Pet Policy', 'We love your furry companions and welcome up to two per apartment home.', 'While we are huge fans of individuality (and the exotic), we have to ask that exotic pals, such as skunks and ferrets, find happy homes with a friend or family member.', 'Please note that we reserve the right to disallow certain aggressive breeds of dogs and aquariums as per our pet addendum.', 'Please contact our leasing office for information.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday - Friday 10:00 A.M. - 6:00 P.M.', 'Saturday 10:00 A.M. - 5:00 P.M.', 'Sunday 12:00 P.M. - 5:00 P.M.', 'Property Contact', 'show contact info', 'show contact info', 'ADA ACCESSIBLE']
